titleInfo.title: Kitty Wells and Johnny Wright at East Wind (20494)

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on brown) announcing Kitty Wells, Johnny Wright, Bobby Wright, Ruby Wright, the Tennessee Mountain Boys, Smiling Jack Hamlet, and the Country Revue with Harvey Carey at East Wind on March 2. Poster features a metal photoplate of Kitty Wells, Johnny Wright, and Bobby Wright. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/51629/

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
